casebody.data:
Rogerio Chaves SCOTTON, petitioner,
v.
UNITED STATES. Rogerio Chaves Scotton, petitioner,
v.
United States. No. 17-9028. Supreme Court of the United States June 25, 2018.

Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied, and petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eleventh Circuit dismissed. See Rule 39.8.
